result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

10:56 AM CO: Nordstrand, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: K Kittel. Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin appeared by video w/Jacqueline Frances Knutson.   Attorney Michael Becker in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Perrin waives time limits for PH and Trial for DE so she may review Discovery. Court notes case is on fast track. Atty may request an earlier PH if desired. Adjourned: 10:59 am

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Jacqueline Frances Knutson
Current: 1900 11th Ave, Baldwin, WI 54002 United States  (Effective: 07-29-2022)
Prior: 423 15th Avenue, Baldwin, WI 54002 
Per bond signed by DE.  gll

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required be fitted with a SCRAM alcohol testing unit and further understand I am to submit to random alcohol testing at least THREE times per day. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. 

If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

1:24 PM CO: SJN, RPR: Deiss, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA: Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY: Travis Satorius for today Defendant Jacqueline Frances Knutson in court, in custody. Defendant does not qualify for PD- PFAC given. Court advises of charges and possible penalties. Waive reading. Bond argument. Court orders bond. Court sets STC to see the status of atty, SETC with DA, and PSC. Adjourned at 1:33 PM.  gll
